package.description: Open URI in browser if server under debugging is ready.
package.debug.server.ready.pattern.description: Server is ready if this pattern appears on the debug console. The first capture group must include the port number.
package.debug.server.ready.uriFormat.description: A format string used when constructing the URI. The first '%s' is substituted with the port number.
package.debug.server.ready.webRoot.description: Value is passed to the chrome debug configuration.
package.debug.server.ready.action.description: What to do with when the server is ready.
package.debug.server.ready.action.debugWithChrom: Start debugging with the Debugger for Chrome.
